summary: A letter from Judge Richard M. Berman to Warden Latrine N'Diaye regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein, expressing that his death is a tragedy and raising an open question about whether investigations will include an incident involving Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on or about July 23, 2019. The letter notes that the Bureau of Prisons' conclusions about that incident have never been definitively explained.
